Properties.Description: NPC's movements are constrained to this hint group once assault has begun
This point is cleared when no enemies are seen for this long (seconds)
If you come in contact with enemies while approaching the assault point, clear our assault point
If you come in contact with enemies while approaching the assault point, divert to kill them. Resume the assault once contact is lost.
If Allow Diversion is set, NPC will only divert from assault to attack an enemy that is within this distance of the assault point. 0 = No limit.
If set, the assault never ends for NPCs assaulting this point. Useful for forcing NPCs back to a point.

Options.Name: No, NPC may move from point to attack
Yes, NPC may not move to attack
Clear this point upon arrival, UNCONDITIONALLY

Properties.Description: NPCs using this assault point are forced into crouching while holding it.
If true, NPCs will consider movement to this assault point as Urgent Navigation.
How far this NPC may move from the assault point to try to attack an enemy.

InputOutputs.Name: SetClearOnContact
InputOutputs.Description: Set the clear on contact flag. NPCs who spot enemies while running to the assault point, or while waiting at it, will immediately Clear it.

InputOutputs.Name: SetAllowDiversion
InputOutputs.Description: Set the allow diversion flag. NPCs who spot enemies whil running to the assault point, or while waiting on it, will divert away (leave Assault mode) to deal with the enemies. Upon losing enemies, they'll go back to Assault mode, and return to this assault point.

InputOutputs.Name: SetForceClear
InputOutputs.Description: Set the Force Clear flag. NPCs who are currently running to the assault point will Clear it immediately. NPCs who acquire it in the future will Clear it automatically.

InputOutputs.Name: OnArrival
InputOutputs.Description: Fires when the NPC reaches this assault point

InputOutputs.Name: OnAssaultClear
InputOutputs.Description: Fires when this assault point is cleared of enemies
